{"id":573206492,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1634566273,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/573206492/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        \n      string s=\"\";\n        while(n!=0)\n        {\n            int a=n%2;\n            s=((char)(a+48))+s;\n            n=n/2;\n        }\n        int k=32-s.length();\n        for(int i=0;i<k;i++)\n        {\n            s='0'+s;\n        }\n     //   cout<<s<<\" \\n\";\n    //reverse(s.begin(),s.end());\n         // cout<<s<<\" \\n\";\n        uint32_t ans=0;int c=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            ans+=(s[i]-48)*pow(2,c);\n            c++;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
